data.text: @freepeeper @LRachelHenry I don't think anyone (in the public) cares about Samantha Markle tbh. The father isn't reaching out to her. He IS reaching out to Meghan.

@TactiKat @LRachelHenry Her point is valid and remains unaddressed and unanswered by you. Why isn’t Samantha Markle spending time with the father she claims is ailing & near death? If family is so important to her, why does she not try to reconcile with her children, NONE of whom speak to her & her mom?
@LRachelHenry @freepeeper Yet here you are, a part of that "disgusting media" on here blabbing your virtual mouth on a virtual "tabloid" and blaming others for what YOU are doing . EL Oh EL.

@freepeeper Like ANYONE with a family member who married a Royal wouldn't be doing the same damn thing. Please. If you were offered $40,000 or more to talk any of you would do it. I would too. Stop acting like Saints. Money talks.

@freepeeper Daily Mail UK is in it for the long game. Piers Morgan has a vendetta against Meghan because she didn't give him the time of day.. so he went to the family. Ultimately, DM is trying to reup a Diana debacle at Meghan's expense. The Royals are do not suffer fools easily like Thomas
@Allen51Julie Just looking at the group you follow let’s me know you’re a moron.
@freepeeper Meghan is in it to "cash in" also.
@Ed59029780 @freepeeper @Ed59029780 is a bot. Don't feed it. @thatisabot

@freepeeper Exactly they have been acting sympathetic towards him but then his true colors came out from him doing those interviews and making threats of not going to stop talking. The media should stop giving these people attention, they’re basically promoting this harassment

@JasmineJay92 The thing is that some in the media has known for a lot longer than the public that TM was lying about the heart procedure. Either that or they’re incredibly incompetent, but they didn’t say anything because they were invested in him being sympathetic figure.

@freepeeper Not only they exposed her, but the media are guilty as well for entertaining this foolishness cause knowing good well that she was cashing in the whole time and have been paying her to doing these interviews. Thomas is guilty as well of cashing in so the sympathy  for him is gone
@freepeeper I agree eventually the Markle's will fade away  back to their miserable lives.   MEGHAN AND HARRY will go on with their lives and have beautiful babies.

They are leeches whose value will diminish over time. I hope the Royal Family continues to starve them of oxygen. The public are already disgusted by them. Tabloids and reality and morning show producers haven’t caught up to that fact yet.
